original_text: Among all these soldiers there were seven hundred select troops who were left-handed, each of whom could sling a stone at a hair and not miss.
korean_text: 이 모든 백성 중에서 택한 칠백 명은 다 왼손잡이라 물매로 돌을 던지면 조금도 틀림이 없는 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: there were seven hundred select troops
each of whom could sling a stone at a hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그 각 사람은 머리카락에도 돌멩이를 던져
